data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Clickable,
        Switch,
        Text,
        Tile,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Clickable.Container>
    <Tile.Container width="content-max">
        <Tile.Section>
            <Tile.Header>Remember Login?</Tile.Header>

            <Text>
                <Text is="small">
                    Your session will be saved to your
                    Browser.
                </Text>
            </Text>
        </Tile.Section>

        <Tile.Footer>
            <Clickable.Label for="clickable-label">
                <Switch
                    palette="affirmative"
                    sizing="medium"
                />
            </Clickable.Label>
        </Tile.Footer>
    </Tile.Container>
</Clickable.Container>
data.title: Clickable Label
